title: Freefall
description: Keely Benson:Nineteen. The age I threw my life away.Twenty-Five. The age I decided to try it a second time.Twenty-Five plus one day. The age Benedict Mason Sinclair III walked into my life.Mason Sinclair III:She was a curse. A sex bomb. A perfect reminder that not having a heart was the best choice I ever made.
author: Zara Cox
